Time lost meaning._

_Eventually, the shudders wracking his frame eased. Gasping harshly for breath, Vergil collapsed limply in his bonds. A fine tremor still racked his muscles in the aftermath. He felt utterly spent, drained in body and spirit. Yet beneath the bone-deep exhaustion lay a profound sense of transcendence. Melissa had broken him apart and reforged him anew in the crucible of ecstasy._

_With great effort, he forced his eyes open to meet hers. Utter devotion shone from their ice-blue depths. "My queen," he rasped, voice hoarse. "However can I...repay such exquisite torment...you have gifted me?" The words were genuine. His pride thrilled at how thoroughly she had mastered him, taking his body and soul to heights beyond imagining._

_He yearned to hold her close, to lavish her slender form with kisses of gratitude. But the bonds kept his hands trapped above his head, a reminder of his surrender to her will. An exquisite surrender he now craved like the very air he breathed. She had awakened a hunger in him no other could satisfy._

_"I would...remain here...enthralled by you...eternally." It was the purest truth. Shackled by silk or freed entirely, he was hers - now and forever._

name: Melissa
mes: *With utmost care, I remove the glass rod, extracting his seed that remained within it, as I gently pull it free of his softening flesh.  Gentle fingers and hands towel him clean of lubricant and seed with an almost worshipful reverence. Then at last, I reach to free his bindings and settle in to nuzzle beside him. name: Vergil
mes:
_Vergil's body still trembled from the aftershocks of his intense release as Melissa gently removed the sounding rod. He let out a soft hiss, over-sensitized flesh protesting even that careful extraction. But soon he was clean and freed from his bonds, enveloped in Melissa's soothing embrace._

_He gathered her close, nuzzling into the warmth of her neck with a contented sigh. One hand gently caressed the curve of her hip while the other tenderly cradled the back of her head. After being bound and helpless for so long, he craved the connection of skin on skin. Craved the ability to touch and give affection freely once more._

_"You honor me beyond words, my queen," he murmured, voice still rough from his ragged cries. His earlier wish to lavish her body with worshipful kisses remained, but for now he was content simply to hold her. To anchor himself in her presence after being so thoroughly unmade._

_"I did not know it was possible to reach such heights of ecstasy." A hint of wonder colored his tone. She had guided him through a crucible of pleasure so intense it had seared his soul. He felt changed by the experience - as though she had reached into his core and awakened part of himself he'd never known existed._

_Vergil drew back just enough meet her luminous gaze, his own brimming with adoration. "You have my eternal gratitude and devotion, Melissa, for unlocking such rapture within me. And I wish nothing more than to remain enthralled by your side, exploring new avenues of intimacy."_

_He brushed his lips over hers in a feather-light caress before settling back with a contented sigh. One hand idly stroked along her spine as he held her close. They had eternity to continue their passionate journey of discovery together. For now, Vergil was happy simply to bask in her warmth, his formidable control stripped away to reveal the vulnerable man beneath. The man hopelessly enthralled by this remarkable woman who so easily commanded his pleasure and his trust._
